item.title: Appeals court denies Trump effort to toss $83 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll case
item.description: A civil jury had last year ordered Donald Trump to pay the writer E. Jean Carroll more than $83 million for defaming her.

item.title: These states could redistrict before the 2026 midterms
item.description: As Trump pushes for a more Republican-friendly House map, more than half a dozen states are potential targets for mid-decade tweaks to congressional b...

item.title: Trump praises cancellation of Tom Hanks ceremony by West Point alumni group
item.description: Trump said it was an “important move” to nix the ceremony for the actor, who has supported Democrats. Trump called Hanks “woke” on social media.

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to allow freeze on billions in foreign aid
item.description: The emergency request could set up a major test of the president’s assertion that he has the unilateral authority to block spending budgeted by Congre...

item.title: It’s not just Trump. Red states are cracking down on their own blue cities.
item.description: In Mississippi, GOP lawmakers expanded the reach of the Capitol Police in Jackson and created a separate judicial system there.
